member.name: T:Tangine.Habbo.HGame
member.summary: Represents the Habbo Hotel flash client.

member.name: P:Tangine.Habbo.HGame.LoggerCallback
member.summary: Gets or sets the delegate to be called when a log has been written.

member.name: P:Tangine.Habbo.HGame.OutgoingMessages
member.summary: Gets the dictionary of Outgoing message classes with the header as the key.

member.name: P:Tangine.Habbo.HGame.IncomingMessages
member.summary: Gets the dictionary of Incoming message classes with the header as they key.

member.name: M:Tangine.Habbo.HGame.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class based on the specified file path.
member.param: The file path of the Shockwave Flash(SWF) file.

member.name: M:Tangine.Habbo.HGame.#ctor(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class based on the specified array of bytes.
member.param: The array of bytes representing the Shockwave Flash(SWF) file.

member.name: M:Tangine.Habbo.HGame.BypassOriginCheck
member.summary: Modifies the bytecode to allow the client to run from anywhere.

member.name: M:Tangine.Habbo.HGame.BypassRemoteHostCheck
member.summary: Modifies the bytecode to allow the client to connect to anywhere.

member.name: M:Tangine.Habbo.HGame.GenerateMessageHashes
member.summary: Generates, and caches a unique MD5 hash for every Outgoing/Incoming message class.

member.name: M:Tangine.Habbo.HGame.ReplaceRSAKeys(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Injects the specified public RSA keys into the bytecode that handles the verification of the received primes.

member.name: M:Tangine.Habbo.HGame.IsMessageClass(FlashInspect.ActionScript.ASClass)
member.summary: Returns a value that determines whether the specified class is associated with an Outgoing/Incoming header.
member.param: The class to check whether it's an Outgoing/Incoming message class.

member.name: M:Tangine.Habbo.HGame.IsMessageOutgoing(FlashInspect.ActionScript.ASClass)
member.summary: Returns a value that determines whether the specified message class is an Outgoing type message class.
member.param: The message class to check whether it is an Outoing message class type.

member.name: M:Tangine.Habbo.HGame.IsMessageReferenced(FlashInspect.ActionScript.ASClass)
member.summary: Returns a value that determines whether the specified message class is used/referenced in the bytecode.
member.param: The message class to check whether it is being referenced.

member.name: M:Tangine.Habbo.HGame.GetClientRevision
member.summary: Returns the hardcoded client revision string from the Outgoing[4000] message class.

member.name: M:Tangine.Habbo.HGame.GetOutgoingMessage(System.UInt16)
member.summary: Returns the Outgoing message class associated with the specified header.
member.param: The header associated with the Outgoing message class.

member.name: M:Tangine.Habbo.HGame.GetIncomingMessage(System.UInt16)
member.summary: Returns the Incoming message class associated with the specified header.
member.param: The header associated with the Incoming message class.

member.name: M:Tangine.Habbo.HGame.GetMessageHash(FlashInspect.ActionScript.ASClass)
member.summary: Returns a unique MD5 hash generated from various information contained in the message class.
member.param: The Outgoing/Incoming message class to create the unique hash from.

member.name: M:Tangine.Habbo.HGame.GetMessageHeader(FlashInspect.ActionScript.ASClass)
member.summary: Returns the header associated with the specified Outgoing/Incoming message class.
member.param: The Outgoing/Incoming message class to grab the associated header from.

member.name: M:Tangine.Habbo.HGame.GetMessages(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a read-only list of message classes associated with the specified unique MD5 hash.
member.param: The unique MD5 hash associated with the message(s).

member.name: M:Tangine.Habbo.HGame.GetMessageHeaders(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a read-only list of headers associated with the specified unique MD5 hash.
member.param: The unique MD5 hash associated with the header(s).

member.name: M:Tangine.Habbo.HGame.GetIncomingMessageParser(FlashInspect.ActionScript.ASClass)
member.summary: Returns the Incoming message's parser class.
member.param: The Incoming message class to extract the parser class from.

member.name: M:Tangine.Habbo.HGame.GetMessageReferences(FlashInspect.ActionScript.ASClass)
member.summary: Returns an enumerable containing references for the specified message class.

member.name: M:Tangine.Habbo.HGame.Disassemble
member.summary: Dissassembles the Habbo Hotel flash client.

member.name: T:Tangine.Properties.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Tangine.Properties.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Tangine.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.
